title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Revised
description: Gather and document comprehensive requirements for the CollaborationNetworkMapper system. This includes identifying data sources (both internal and external APIs), specifying desired outputs, detailing any specific constraints or assumptions, outlining potential integration points with other systems. Additionally, consider the scalability, security, and privacy requirements of the project, focusing on real-time processing capabilities to ensure timely collaboration network analysis. Also, outline a strategy for handling large datasets efficiently. Consider using big data technologies like Hadoop or Spark for this purpose. Lastly, specify the format and frequency of reports or visualizations to be generated, including possible interactive features and customization options. Additionally, explore potential use cases beyond simple collaboration network analysis, such as sentiment analysis of communication channels.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the system, including the data ingestion pipeline, data storage, and data processing components.

title: Implement Data Ingestion Pipeline
description: Develop the components responsible for ingesting data from various sources (e.g., email, chat logs, project management tools) and preparing it for analysis.

title: Design and Implement Data Storage
description: Design and implement the data storage solution for storing and managing the ingested data.

title: Develop Network Analysis Algorithms
description: Implement algorithms and techniques for analyzing the collaboration data and identifying key connectors and potential silos within the organization.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for visualizing and interacting with the collaboration network data.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Implement appropriate security measures and access controls to ensure data privacy and compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the CollaborationNetworkMapper system to facilitate automated testing and deployment.

title: Conduct System Testing
description: Perform comprehensive testing of the CollaborationNetworkMapper system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.
dependencies: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment

title: Write Documentation
description: Prepare user documentation, technical documentation, and any other relevant documentation for the CollaborationNetworkMapper system.
